Parameters: byte: the contents of the preview frame in the format defined by @B_android#graphics#ImageFormat_E@, which can be queried with @B_android#hardware#Camera#Parameters#getPreviewFormat_E@. If @B_android#hardware#Camera#Parameters#setPreviewFormat_E@ is never called, the default will be the YCbCr_420_SP (NV21) format.
onPreviewFrame(byte[],android.hardware.C.Description: Called as preview frames are displayed. This callback is invoked on the event thread @B_android#hardware#Camera#open_E@ was called from. If using the @B_android#graphics#ImageFormat#YV12_E@ format, refer to the equations in @B_android#hardware#Camera#Parameters#setPreviewFormat_E@ for the arrangement of the pixel data in the preview callback buffers.
onPreviewFrame(byte[],android.hardware.C.history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 21
onPreviewFrame(byte[],android.hardware.C.FullName: public abstract void onPreviewFrame (byte[] data, Camera camera)

ClassDesc: We recommend using the new @B_android#hardware#camera2#package-summary_E@ API for new applications. Callback interface used to deliver copies of preview frames as they are displayed.
